---
title: Finding Content by Tag
---

## Problem

You want to find all content items that have a specific tag assigned.

## Solution

::: {.panel-tabset group="language"}

## Python

A tag identifier is required to find content items. See [Viewing Tag Information](../../06-content-organization/01-viewing-tag-information/index.qmd) for details.

```{.python}
from posit import connect
client = connect.Client()

TAG_ID = "42"

res = client.get(f"/v1/tags/{TAG_ID}/content")
```

The response can be easily turned into a DataFrame.

## R

The `content_list_by_tag()` function requires a `Tag` object representing. See [Viewing Tag Information](../../06-content-organization/01-viewing-tag-information/index.qmd) for details.

```{.r}
library(connectapi)
client <- connect()

tag_tree <- get_tags(client)
target_tag <- tag_tree$Departments$Administrative

tagged_content <- content_list_by_tag(client, target_tag)
```

The `content_list_by_tag()` function returns a data frame of content information.
